segments.text: Have you bought War Craft 2 yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! I bought it the day it was released .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a great game . There are a lot of new characters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It cost about thirty . Most games cost about that much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mechwarrior is such a good game . The graphics are awesome !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I know what you mean . I'm addicted to that game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My roommate always wants to play it . But I told her to buy her own game .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , my roommate likes to watch me play . He says it's like watching a movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never seen such good graphics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I've never heard such good sound in a game .
segments.speaker: S2
